EmailTemplate.subject: We have not heard from you in a while
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Following your non attendance at the assessment you booked with us please contact me on the email address below if you are still interested in working for The Challenge.
If we do not hear from you in 7 working days your application will be moved to our dormant applications file .
If you wish to reactivate your application please select an assessment date by accessing the link below and email me so that I can reactivate your application if job placements still remain available in your area.
Please click on the button below to choose your preferred assessment date and time.
http://thechallenge.secure.force.com/AvailableDates?key={!Job_Application__c.ContactId__c}&Type={!Job_Application__c.00NC0000005EVyp}&JType={!Job_Application__c.Id}
If you cannot access the booking page for any reason, please call me on the number below.
Thank you for your interest in The Challenge.
Kind regards
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} The Challenge Network t: {!Contact.OwnerPhone} e: {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
CR 1.5.2
